name: Renamed Microsoft Excel Spreadsheet
summary: An _XLSX file is a Microsoft Excel spreadsheet that has had its extension changed from .XLSX to ._xlsx . A user or program may have changed the file's extension on purpose or by accident. _XLSX files can be opened in Microsoft Excel and other spreadsheet programs after you rename them to use the .xlsx extension.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.

windows.display_name: Must be renamed to .xlsx then opened as an XLSX file

macos.display_name: Must be renamed to .xlsx then opened as an XLSX file

linux.display_name: Must be renamed to .xlsx then opened as an XLSX file

web.display_name: Must be renamed to .xlsx then opened as an XLSX file

ios.display_name: Must be renamed to .xlsx then opened as an XLSX file

android.display_name: Must be renamed to .xlsx then opened as an XLSX file
